forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will become lighter and change to all rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to lingering snow showers overnight. Low 28F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
